betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oAssemble the gaia arena and click the beacon with call of the void.

§fThese guardians are dreadful, and yet I cannot help but feel pity for them. If my theory is true, they cannot really help being mindless murder machines with the instincts of the most seasoned warriors.
If it is within my power, I will try to do something about this! If the oath is still alive, there must be a way to put an end to it.
Who did these guardians answer to? Who is their master?
The stronger my call into this dead world, the stronger the response. So maybe I just have to call harder?
